hadiths.text: Zaid bin Aslam narrated from his father that:the Prophet said: "Whoever sleeps past his Al-Witr then let him pray it in the morning

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي الرَّجُلِ يَنَامُ عَنِ الْوِتْرِ أَوْ يَنْسَاهُ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About A Man Who Sleeps Past Al-Witr Or Forgets It
